description: Why shouldn't we trust adults to manage the way they handle after-office messages? Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Push for right to disconnect requires less wishful thinking
title_page: Push for right to disconnect requires less wishful thinking | The Straits Times
maintext:
Is your boss exploitative? Is your company extractive? And are you completely helpless?
Judging from the slew of new workplace rules globally, one gets the impression that middle managers must be slave-driving villains about to turn staff into serfs.
